p1h21: Using SGSTUDIOS Game API you have to apply developer account. You can go
p1h22: for registration. Fill in company name and contact for the benefit of managers to open your account.
p1h3: Waiting for managers to send open Email after registration. When you receive the opening Email and click link to lanuch your developer account.
p1h41: When developer account launch you can go
p1h42: add new game you want to launch to SGSTUDIOS Game Platform.
p1h5: Waiting for administrator to open your game. You can get Game ID and Private Key after received open Email. Then you can using SGSTUDIOS Game API.
Results: Code = 1 for success, others are failures
P2h21: Developers can use the call URL
P2h22: Call SG Game API web page.
P2h31: Interface description: Call before SG Game API is called
P3h1: User system interface includes login, an account number, query password, change the password, the parents safe operation, set the child information, account overview, logout.
P3h41: call to retrieve the password page
P3h6: Before calling the account settings need to call the parent safety operation page to prevent children from accidentally hit important function.
P3h8: Call the account overview to browse the children's game record
